import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpService } from 'src/app/service/http.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(public http:HttpService) }
